attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Freedom of expression and the nature of natural language allow many things to be said that are not exactly understood by any particular recipient. It is not however not Humpty-Dumptyilly impossible that they may never be recognised by anyone.
Natural language should be allowed to grow without linguistic borders within the current culture.
This is preferable to having to translate between discrete, mutually ignorant, recognised languages.
